unnormalised: The Ministry of Finance, Govt. of India, located at North Block, Raisina Hill, New Delhi, 110001, has announced new fiscal policies effective 01/04/2025. The notification, released earlier today, outlines changes to the Goods and Services Tax (GST) rates for several sectors. These amendments are anticipated to significantly impact various industries across the nation. The complete details are available on the official website, finmin.nic.in.
normalised: The Ministry of Finance, Government of India, located at North Block, Raisina Hill, New Delhi, one one zero zero zero one, has announced new fiscal policies effective first april two thousand and twenty five. The notification, released earlier today, outlines changes to the Goods and Services Tax (G-S-T) rates for several sectors. These amendments are anticipated to significantly impact various industries across the nation. The complete details are available on the official website, finmin.nic.in.

unnormalised: The Department of Telecom (DoT), Sanchar Bhavan, 20, Ashoka Road, New Delhi – 110001, is currently reviewing applications for 5G spectrum allocation. Several major telecom players, including Airtel and Jio, have submitted their bids. The results are expected to be announced by 15/12/2024. This move aims to enhance connectivity and improve digital infrastructure nationwide. Further details can be accessed via dot.gov.in.
normalised: The Department of Telecom (D-o-T), Sanchar Bhavan, twenty, Ashoka Road, New Delhi – one one zero zero zero one, is currently reviewing applications for five G spectrum allocation. Several major telecom players, including Airtel and Jio, have submitted their bids. The results are expected to be announced by fifteenth december two thousand and twenty four. This move aims to enhance connectivity and improve digital infrastructure nationwide. Further details can be accessed via dot.gov.in.

unnormalised: The Reserve Bank of India (RBI), situated at Shahid Bhagat Singh Road, Fort, Mumbai-400001, has maintained the repo rate at 6.5% during its recent monetary policy meeting. This decision aims to control inflation and stabilize the Indian economy. RBI Governor Shaktikanta Das addressed the media earlier today, explaining the rationale behind the policy. The official press release is available on rbi.org.in.
normalised: The Reserve Bank of India (R-B-I), situated at Shahid Bhagat Singh Road, Fort, Mumbai-four zero zero zero zero one, has maintained the repo rate at six point five percent during its recent monetary policy meeting. This decision aims to control inflation and stabilize the Indian economy. R-B-I Governor Shaktikanta Das addressed the media earlier today, explaining the rationale behind the policy. The official press release is available on rbi.org.in.

unnormalised: The Election Commission of India (ECI), Nirvachan Sadan, Ashoka Road, New Delhi – 110001, has announced the schedule for the upcoming Lok Sabha elections. Polling will commence on 18/04/2025 and conclude on 26/05/2025. Chief Election Commissioner Rajiv Kumar urged all eligible citizens to register and participate in the democratic process. Detailed information can be found on eci.gov.in.
normalised: The Election Commission of India (E-C-I), Nirvachan Sadan, Ashoka Road, New Delhi – one one zero zero zero one, has announced the schedule for the upcoming Lok Sabha elections. Polling will commence on eighteenth april two thousand and twenty five and conclude on twenty sixth may two thousand and twenty five. Chief Election Commissioner Rajiv Kumar urged all eligible citizens to register and participate in the democratic process. Detailed information can be found on eci.gov.in.

unnormalised: The Indian Space Research Organisation (ISRO), Antariksh Bhavan, New BEL Road, Bangalore 560094, successfully launched the GSAT-24 satellite on 07/11/2024. This launch will significantly enhance India's communication capabilities. ISRO Chairman S. Somanath congratulated the entire team on this achievement. Updates and further details can be obtained from isro.gov.in.
normalised: The Indian Space Research Organisation (I-S-R-O), Antariksh Bhavan, New B-E-L Road, Bangalore five six zero zero nine four, successfully launched the G-S-A-T-twenty four satellite on seventh november two thousand and twenty four. This launch will significantly enhance India's communication capabilities. I-S-R-O Chairman S. Somanath congratulated the entire team on this achievement. Updates and further details can be obtained from isro.gov.in.

unnormalised: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences (AIIMS), Ansari Nagar, New Delhi, 110029, is facing an increased influx of patients with respiratory ailments due to rising pollution levels in Delhi. Dr. Randeep Guleria, Director of AIIMS, advised citizens to take necessary precautions. The hospital helpline, 011-26588500, is available for immediate assistance. Further information can be found on aiims.edu.
normalised: The All India Institute of Medical Sciences (A-I-I-M-S), Ansari Nagar, New Delhi, one one zero zero two nine, is facing an increased influx of patients with respiratory ailments due to rising pollution levels in Delhi. Doctor Randeep Guleria, Director of A-I-I-M-S, advised citizens to take necessary precautions. The hospital helpline, zero one one-two six five eight eight five zero zero, is available for immediate assistance. Further information can be found on aiims.edu.

unnormalised: The Central Board of Secondary Education (CBSE), Shiksha Kendra, 2, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-110092, has released the date sheet for the Class 10 and Class 12 board exams. The exams will commence on 01/03/2025. Students can download the date sheet from the official website, cbse.nic.in. Parents and students are advised to prepare accordingly.
normalised: The Central Board of Secondary Education (C-B-S-E), Shiksha Kendra, two, Community Centre, Preet Vihar, Delhi-one one zero zero nine two, has released the date sheet for the Class ten and Class twelve board exams. The exams will commence on first march two thousand and twenty five. Students can download the date sheet from the official website, cbse.nic.in. Parents and students are advised to prepare accordingly.
